languages.text: "Мы счастливы сей милости, Ваша Светлость! Жизнь в столице куда спокойнее и размереннее, чем на корабле. И я даже почти привык к гравитации". {n}Протез, поддерживающий позвоночник пустотнорожденного, скрипит под одеждой, когда мужчина неловко склоняется в поклоне.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вполне сносно, Ваша Светлость! Вид из нашего шпиля замечательный на рассвете. И я даже почти привык к гравитации". {n}Протез, поддерживающий позвоночник пустотнорожденного, скрипит из-под одежд, когда мужчина неловко смеется.{/n}

languages.text: "We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы счастливы сей милости, Ваша Светлость! Жизнь в столице куда спокойнее и размереннее, чем на корабле. И я даже почти привык к гравитации". {n}Протез, поддерживающий позвоночник пустотнорожденного, скрипит под одеждой, когда мужчина неловко склоняется в поклоне.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We are delighted by this favour, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Compared to the ship, life at the capital is much calmer and slower. And I am almost used to gravity by now." {n}The prosthetic supporting the voidborn man's spine creaks under his clothes as he tries awkwardly to bow.{/n}

"We are delighted by this favour, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Compared to the ship, life at the capital is much calmer and slower. And I am almost used to gravity by now." {n}The prosthetic supporting the voidborn man's spine creaks under his clothes as he tries awkwardly to bow.{/n}

"We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting his spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

"We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting his spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

"We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

"We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

languages.text: « Nous sommes extrêmement reconnaissants de la faveur qui nous a été faite, Votre Seigneurie ! Dans la capitale, la vie est bien plus calme et tranquille que sur un vaisseau. Je me suis moi-même presque habitué à la gravité. » {n}La prothèse soutenant la colonne vertébrale de Randor émet quelques craquements sonores sous ses vêtements alors qu'il tente une révérence maladroite.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes extrêmement reconnaissants de la faveur qui nous a été faite, Votre Seigneurie ! Dans la capitale, la vie est bien plus calme et tranquille que sur un vaisseau. Je me suis moi-même presque habitué à la gravité. » {n}La prothèse soutenant la colonne vertébrale de Randor émet quelques craquements sonores sous ses vêtements alors qu'il tente une révérence maladroite.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Estamos encantados por el favor que nos ha sido concedido, mi{mf|lord|lady}! La vida en la capital es mucho más tranquila y pausada que en la nave. Y ya casi consigo acostumbrarme a la gravedad». {n}La prótesis que sostiene el espinazo de Randor cruje bajo sus ropas cuando intenta hacerte una reverencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Estamos encantados por el favor que nos ha sido concedido, mi{mf|lord|lady}! La vida en la capital es mucho más tranquila y pausada que en la nave. Y ya casi consigo acostumbrarme a la gravedad». {n}La prótesis que sostiene el espinazo de Randor cruje bajo sus ropas cuando intenta hacerte una reverencia.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下、お気遣いいただき誠に感謝します！首都惑星での生活は、この船に比べればずっと穏やかでゆっくりとしたものです。重力にもほとんど慣れましたよ」{n}ランドールがぎこちなくお辞儀をする体勢になると、彼の背骨を支える補装具が服の下できしんだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、お気遣いいただき誠に感謝します！首都惑星での生活は、この船に比べればずっと穏やかでゆっくりとしたものです。重力にもほとんど慣れましたよ」{n}ランドールがぎこちなくお辞儀をする体勢になると、彼の背骨を支える補装具が服の下できしんだ。{/n}

languages.text: “我们非常感谢您的恩情，大人！和船上的生活相比，首都世界的生活要平静得多，节奏也要慢很多。而且，我也差不多适应了重力。”{n}兰德尔笨拙地想要鞠躬，支撑脊椎的假肢在他的衣服下吱吱作响。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们非常感谢您的恩情，大人！和船上的生活相比，首都世界的生活要平静得多，节奏也要慢很多。而且，我也差不多适应了重力。”{n}兰德尔笨拙地想要鞠躬，支撑脊椎的假肢在他的衣服下吱吱作响。{/n}

languages.text: "Wir freuen uns sehr über die uns erwiesene Gunst, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Das Leben in der Hauptwelt ist viel ruhiger und langsamer als auf dem Schiff. Und ich habe mich fast schon an die Schwerkraft gewöhnt." {n}Die Prothese, die Randors Wirbelsäule stützt, knarzt unter seiner Kleidung, als er ungeschickt versucht, sich zu verbeugen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir freuen uns sehr über die uns erwiesene Gunst, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Das Leben in der Hauptwelt ist viel ruhiger und langsamer als auf dem Schiff. Und ich habe mich fast schon an die Schwerkraft gewöhnt." {n}Die Prothese, die Randors Wirbelsäule stützt, knarzt unter seiner Kleidung, als er ungeschickt versucht, sich zu verbeugen.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bize gösterilen iyilikten son derece memnunuz! Başkentteki hayat, gemidekine kıyasla çok daha sakin ve yavaş ilerliyor. Yer çekimine alıştım sayılır." {n}Randor'un omurgasını destekleyen protez, tuhaf bir şekilde eğilmeye kalkışmasıyla birlikte kıyafetlerinin altında çatırdıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We are delighted by the favour shown to us, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! Life in the capital is much calmer and slower compared to the ship. And I have almost gotten used to the gravity." {n}The prosthetic supporting Randor's spine creaks under his clothes as he attempts an awkward bow.{/n}
